channel.title: Culture on Welsh Technical Standards Board
channel.description: Recent content in Culture on Welsh Technical Standards Board

item.title: Using standards to change culture
item.description: Our mission is to : support the creation and maintenance of a catalogue of standards and requirements to enable integration and interoperability across all health and care systems in a consistent and secure manner, and to support local innovation and the use of third party delivery partners. from WTSB Terms of Reference And we are working hard to build that catalogue. But is that all we need to do?
